feature.label: Android ORM Feature
feature.description:
[Feature] 1, New Activity/Service/BroadcaseReceiver 2, New (ORM)ContentProvder 3, Configurated in AndroidManifest.xml automatically 4, Add/Remove ORM lib(s) 5, Generate DDL
[Change]
